Articles.Content:
Sorry if I'm missing something, or if there was already a thread for this. I've found that in version .25, radial chutes don't work for some reason. They deploy, but never appear, and their icon becomes red indicating that they were damaged. The flight log makes no mention of it. I don't believe it's related to a mod, but I do have a few installed. Has this happened to anyone else?

Thanks for any help.

I too had the feeling that parachutes have become more fragile, but I cannot say if it is something new in kSP or FAR, DRE or another mod - or just that I got used to have RealChute available.

Try opening them at lower speeds, 200m/s seems to work most of the times - and 100m/s for fully open chutes (<500m).
